Description: Rectangular limestone tomb-relief; row of Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: cf. Zivie-Coche, Giza au premier millenaire (1991): 284, n.860 who disputes that these reliefs come from the tomb of Pakap [as De Meulenaere, BIFAO 81 Suppl.: 89]. cf. L M Leahy, JEA 75 (1989), 239-243.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 91)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
